column5: How can I retrieve my old PM's, anyone know? Rick gave me a link in chat the other day but I couldnt get it to work. Dont want to lose some important info.  Thanks
I backed mine up but only got 150 of them for some reason  maybe they could open that part of the old board up , so everyone that wants to, can back them up
Dano I am glad to see your lady has come home, hopefully Terry did not corrupt her any.  Regards, Sam
if you look close, you will see finger prints
No worse for the wear Terry!!!
I'm with ya guys.  I too would love access to those old PM's.  For lots they are the only phone numbers I have for members to connect and fish.
you can go over and get them anytime. The site is only closed to posting.
I downloaded all of mine earlier today, no problem.  Now, my bookmarks, that's another issue, lol.
